headline: T. Rowe Price lays off 54 Baltimore City employees
summary: T. Rowe Price laid off 54 Baltimore City employees effective Feb. 6, according to Maryland’s Work Adjustment and Retraining Notifications filed with the state’s Department of Labor. The layoffs come nearly a year after the Baltimore-based investment management firm opened a 2,000-employee headquarters in Harbor Point. In July, the company announced “targeted role eliminations” but declined to ...
